Of course people will be pissed, if Michael suddenly decides to invest time and effort in a series that most people will never be able to watch through non-illegal means. That automatically means that VSauce will no longer be Michael's main focus, which will inevitably mean that VSauce will suffer at some point. Be it through having to wait even longer for new videos or by receiving "rushed" content.

Also, the whole "he's gotta make money" thing is kind of a non-point, seeing as he already makes (fairly large amounts of) money through ad revenue. This video here alone could've potentially amassed at least $5000, which is more than the average monthly income of an entire US household.

Sometimes I have heard a song on the radio or the next ad before it actually happened. It is like having. You know that tip of the tongue feeling and a word or image would appear in the mind's eye, and then a moment or two it would show up on tv or on the radio. That has happened to me. So maybe we, at least a little, anticipate the future. A lot can happen in a split second. You can have a vision of the next few moments and react faster than thought.
